hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah was asked about a man who divorced his wife, and she married another man who had a closed meeting with her then divorced her, before having intercourse with her. Is it permissible for her to remarry the first husband? The Messenger of Allah said: 'No, not until the second one tastes her sweetness and she tastes his sweetness

chapter.ara-name: باب الطَّلاَقِ لِلَّتِي تَنْكِحُ زَوْجًا ثُمَّ لاَ يَدْخُلُ بِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Divorce Of A Woman Who Married A Man, But He Did Not Consummate The Marriage With Her
